library(plotly)
library(reshape2)

#project.id <- 'tools.pdt'
file.evol = paste("", project.id, "_mls_evol.csv", sep="")
evol <- read.csv(file=file.evol, header=T)
evol <- evol[evol$sent != 0,]

my.data.long <- melt(evol[,c(1,2,4:9)], id.vars="date", value.name="value", variable.name="metric")
p <-plot_ly(my.data.long, x = date, y = metric, size = value, mode = "markers", width=800, height=350) %>%
      layout(autosize = F, width=800, height=350)
p
